sentences.en: He lay there rolling'round in the welter of his gore.
sentences.cn: 他放置在那里旋转'他的流出血翻滚的回合.

sentences.en: In the latest welter of housing data, some have seen green shoots.
sentences.cn: 有些人在最近杂乱无章的房屋数据中看到了复苏的萌芽.

sentences.en: In trade ( both goods and services ), a welter of impediments persist.
sentences.cn: 无论在商品贸易还是服务 贸易 方面, 都有着大量杂乱无章的障碍.

sentences.en: Mother told her son not to welter in pleasure and idleness.
sentences.cn: 妈妈对他的儿子说不要沉溺于享乐和闲逸之中.

sentences.en: Out of the welter of dust, the car came to the girl's home.
sentences.cn: 车子在飞扬的尘土中来到高小妹的家.

sentences.en: Pigs often welter in the mud.
The plan amid a welter of criticism but has now been revived in a different guise.
sentences.cn: 这个方案因为备受非议而夭折,现在经过改头换面重新推出.

sentences.en: There is a welter of information on the subject.
sentences.cn: 关于这个问题有一大堆乱七八糟的信息。

words.tran_cn: 次中量级摔交运动员；次中量级拳击手

trans.tran_en: a large and confusing amount or number of something
